# fl-modal

This is a modal.

<fl-modal header="This is a modal.">
    <p slot="content">
        Hi, I'm a modal!
    </p>
</fl-modal>


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                         | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `header` | `header`  | The title to be displayed in the modal. "Title" creates a conflict. | `string` | `undefined` |
